Class SentencedPassageCandidateFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.openqa.test.team04.passage.finder.SentencedPassageCandidateFinder

extends java.lang.Object
    Returns Passage Candidates with offset, probability and text.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SentencedPassageCandidateFinder

        public SentencedPassageCandidateFinder(java.util.List<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.framework.data.Keyterm> keyterms,
                               java.util.List<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.framework.data.RetrievalResult> documents,
                               edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.core.provider.solr.SolrWrapper wrapper)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Finder constructor. In this constructor, it did the following things: 1. iterate all document candidate and calculate the idf values 2. chunk all documents into sentences and treat each sentence as passage candidate
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • extractPassages

        public java.util.List<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.framework.data.PassageCandidate> extractPassages()
        This function returns a list of passage candidates. This function did the following things: 1. for each document, calculate total keyterm and total matches 2. for each passage candidate, calculate keyterm found and keyterm matches 3. calculate score for each passage candidate 4. filter the candidate with no keyterms in it 5. find the candidate "true" offset in html files using the current text. 6. add passage candidate into results list
